name: Tap Tap: Sơn Tùng M-TP
description:
Tap Tap ft. Son Tung M-TP is a beat tapping game with classic gameplay and exclusive HITS from Son Tung M-TP. Turn on maximum volume or use headphone for the best experience with your most favorite song and enjoy the beat fever.

How To Play

- Tap the ball as it reaches scoring areas. You score by getting as much combo as possible with Perfect tap accuracy.

Game Features
- Exclusive HITS from Son Tung M-TP.
- Challenge your friends in Weekly Tournament.

Are you ready to tap and become the next tap hero, or rhythm game incarnate? Try this now for FREE!
